alert.note: Alert for Cedar (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 8:46AM CDT until May 02 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County. For the Sac River Basin...including Caplinger Mills...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills. * WHEN...From this evening to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, minor Flooding occurs at the gage site. The campground at Caplinger Mills floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 16.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight to 12.3 feet and begin rising again Monday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.2 feet on 07/13/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 900 AM CDT.
